Name: [Artifice] Pitch Dark Cape
Desc:
Each movement on the current floor causes an additional <color=#CF4029>100%</color> Pressure.
Upon reaching the next floor, the Pressure increase from movements is reduced by <color=#2BAD00>100%</color>.
Desc2: The cloak is the most reliable partner for a magician. It can even be used to shield oneself from rotten eggs and tomatoes when exposed.
